elements.title: Donn Piatt
elements.contents: ... that Donn Piatt (pictured) threw his mathematics teacher out of the window?

elements.title: stay of exit
elements.contents: ... that the stay of exit has trapped possibly hundreds of British people?

elements.title: Ala Stanford
elements.contents: ... that Ala Stanford established the Black Doctors COVID-19 Consortium to fight racism in medicine, vaccinating nearly 4,000 people?

elements.title: Röhm scandal
elements.contents: ... that as a result of the Röhm scandal, a Nazi became the world's first openly gay politician in 1932?

elements.title: Zoe Progl
elements.contents: ... that in 1960, Zoe Progl became the first woman to escape over the wall of HM Prison Holloway?

elements.title: Mansfield Theatre
elements.contents: ... that in its first two decades, the Mansfield Theatre had only two "outstanding hits", both performed by all-Black casts?

elements.title: Vella Pillay
elements.contents: ... that economist and anti-apartheid activist Vella Pillay arranged for South African revolutionaries to receive military training in the Soviet Union and China?

elements.title: Truth or Consequences Hot Springs
elements.contents: ... that the Apache leader Geronimo soaked in Truth or Consequences Hot Springs?
